skillDetails.name: Outlast
skillDetails.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.
